stories.text:
TL:DR How do you find labs/centres working on your area of interest ?

I started reading DL research papers a few months ago. Before that I used solely mooc materials or textbooks. I have found that reading every recent paper from a topic is not possible and discovering decent projects is almost impossible.

Recently I discovered : HanLab e.g. https://hanlab.mit.edu/projects/ofa/

It's decent but finding these kind of labs seems difficult. I couldn't find it listed on any MIT website. Stumbled upon it link to link.
